Road2Supercar.title: Road2Supercar
description: I designed and developed a dealership eCommerce platform focused on usability, performance, and conversion optimization. Customers can easily browse inventory, access detailed product or vehicle information, and complete inquiries or transactions online.

The platform features responsive design, fast load times, and streamlined navigation to ensure a smooth experience across all devices. This project demonstrates my ability to build scalable, user-friendly eCommerce systems tailored to dealership businesses.
info: JSON file for product listings, preventing hard-coding

MoneeSplit.title: MoneeSplit
description: Budgeting app that allows users to input their paycheck and instantly see how money is allocated across categories such as savings, bills, personal spending, and investments.
This project began as a personal need for a cleaner, faster way to visualize paycheck distribution and is now being developed into a full-featured budgeting solution..

Back2Benefits.title: Back2Benefits (TEAM PROJECT)
description: Non-profit website created to support individuals and families who are struggling after the reduction or discontinuation of SNAP (Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program) benefits.
The platform connects users with resources, volunteer opportunities, and donation options, helping communities access the support they need during difficult times.

OnlineCalculator.title: Online Calculator
description: A simple and interactive online calculator this calculator mimics a small handheld calculator and supports basic arithmetic operations. Users can also view a history of their previous calculations.
info: Basic arithmetic operations: Addition, Subtraction, Multiplication, Division
Clear all button to start a new operation (CLEAR)

OnlineGame.title: Online Game (Rock, Paper, Scissors)
description: A simple and interactive Rock, Paper, Scissors game. The user type their choice, the computer generates a random one, and the game determines the winner.
info: Score tracking for both user and computer
